1 #include <geometry_msgs/Pose.h>
2 #include <ros/console.h>
3 #include <ros/ros.h>
4 #include <swarmus_ros_simulation/tf_publisher.h>

6 const tf::Transform SimulationTfPublisher::getUnitTransform() {
7  tf::Transform transform;
8 
9  transform.setRotation(tf::Quaternion::getIdentity());
10 
11  return transform;
12 }
13 
14 const bool SimulationTfPublisher::getMapToWorldTransform(
15  const std::string& entity_name,
16  const tf::Transform& base_footprint_to_world_tf,
17  tf::Transform& map_to_world_tf) {
18  tf::StampedTransform map_to_base_footprint_stamped_tf;
19  try {
20  tfListener_.lookupTransform(entity_name + "/base_footprint", entity_name + "/map",
21  ros::Time(0), map_to_base_footprint_stamped_tf);
22  map_to_world_tf = base_footprint_to_world_tf * map_to_base_footprint_stamped_tf;
23  return true;
24  } catch (tf::TransformException ex) {
25  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
26  }
27  return false;
28 }
29 
30 void SimulationTfPublisher::tfCallback(const gazebo_msgs::ModelStates& msg) {
31  std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it_name;
32  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Pose>::const_iterator it_pose = msg.pose.begin();
33 
34  for (it_name = msg.name.begin(); it_name != msg.name.end(); ++it_name) {
35  const geometry_msgs::Pose entity_pose = *it_pose;
36  const std::string entity_name(*it_name);
37  bool has_map_tf = false;
38 
39  if (entity_publish_map_tf_list_.find(entity_name) != entity_publish_map_tf_list_.end()) {
40  // Check if we registered that this entity has a map frame
41  has_map_tf = entity_publish_map_tf_list_[entity_name];
42  } else {
43  // Register if the node has a map transform
44  ros::param::get(entity_name + "/use_map_tf", has_map_tf);
45  entity_publish_map_tf_list_[entity_name] = has_map_tf;
46  if (has_map_tf) {
47  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sim_tf_pub: Map frame is expected for " << entity_name);
48  } else {
49  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Sim_tf_pub: Map frame is not expected for " << entity_name);
50  }
51  }
52 
53  if (has_map_tf) {
54  /* Change the transform between the map and the world so the transform between
55  the base_link and the world is consistent with Gazebo*/
56 
57  tf::Transform entity_to_world_tf;
58  tf::Transform map_to_world_tf;
59  tf::poseMsgToTF(entity_pose, entity_to_world_tf);
60 
61  if (getMapToWorldTransform(entity_name, entity_to_world_tf, map_to_world_tf)) {
62  tfBroadcaster_.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(map_to_world_tf, ros::Time::now(),
63  "world", entity_name + "/map"));
64  }
65  } else {
66  // Send transform relative to "world"
67  tfBroadcaster_.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(getUnitTransform(), ros::Time::now(),
68  "world", entity_name + "/odom"));
69  }
70 
71  // Point towards next pose
72  ++it_pose;
73  }
74 }
75 
76 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
77  ros::init(argc, argv, "tf_publisher");
78 
79  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Simulation TF publisher initialization");
80  SimulationTfPublisher simTfPublisher;
81  ros::NodeHandle node("~");
82  ros::Subscriber sub = node.subscribe("/gazebo/model_states", 1,
83  &SimulationTfPublisher::tfCallback, &simTfPublisher);
84 
85  double tf_publish_rate = 0.0;
86  if (node.getParam("tf_publish_rate", tf_publish_rate)) {
87  if (tf_publish_rate > 0.0) {
88  ros::Rate rate(tf_publish_rate);
89  while (ros::ok()) {
90  ros::spinOnce();
91  rate.sleep();
92  }
93  } else {
94  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Non-valid publishing frequency was provided");
95  }
96  } else {
97  ROS_INFO_STREAM(
98  "No frequency was provided. Will published at the same rate as Gazebo msgs");
99  ros::spin();
100  }
101 
102  return 0;
103 };
